dstm2.factory.twophase

Class Adapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dstm2.factory.twophase.Adapter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter<T>

    public class Adapter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Adapter<T>
    Simple two-phase locking implementation. Warning This class is intended for tutorial purposes only. It is inefficient, but does a pretty good job of illustrating basic mechanisms.
